description: This Upward Mobility app for Palm webOS provides 327 essential terms for the CompTIA Server+ SK0-003 certification exam.  Hone your knowledge of key server concepts with this easy-to-use flash card app.   *   Each flash card contains a key  term or concept taken straight from the CompTIA Server+ exam, followed by a clear and concise explanation and definition.   ||  All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  Vocabulary topics include: RAIN, SCSI, disaster recovery, and server setup and networking.  ||  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
